verses.verse: (A Song, a Psalm of David.) My heart<WH3820> is steadfast,<WH3559> O God;<WH430> I will sing,<WH7891> I will sing<WH2167> praises,<WH2167> even<WH637> with my soul.<WH9202>
Awake,<WH5782> harp<WH5035> and lyre;<WH3658> I will awaken<WH5782> the dawn!<WH7837>
I will give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thee, O Lord,<WH3068> among the peoples;<WH5971> And I will sing<WH2167> praises<WH2167> to Thee among the nations.<WH3816>
For Thy lovingkindness<WH2617> is great<WH1419> above<WH4480> <WH5921> the heavens;<WH8064> And Thy truth<WH571> [reaches] to the skies.<WH7834>
Be exalted,<WH7311> O God,<WH430> above<WH5921> the heavens,<WH8064> And Thy glory<WH9202> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
That Thy beloved<WH3039> may be delivered,<WH2502> Save<WH3467> with Thy right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and answer<WH6030> me!
God<WH430> has spoken<WH1696> in His holiness:<WH6944> "I will exult,<WH5937> I will portion<WH2505> out Shechem,<WH7927> And measure<WH4058> out the valley<WH6010> of Succoth.<WH5523>
"Gilead<WH1568> is Mine, Manasseh<WH4519> is Mine; Ephraim<WH669> also is the helmet<WH4581> of My head;<WH7218> Judah<WH3063> is My scepter.<WH2710>
"Moab<WH4124> is My washbowl<WH7366>;<WH5518> Over<WH5921> Edom<WH9000> I shall throw<WH7993> My shoe;<WH5275> Over<WH5921> Philistia<WH6429> I will shout<WH7321> aloud.<WH7321>"
Who<WH4310> will bring<WH2986> me into the besieged<WH4013> city<WH5892>? Who<WH4310> will lead<WH5148> me to Edom<WH9000>?
Hast not Thou Thyself, O God,<WH430> rejected<WH2186> us? And wilt Thou not go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> with our armies,<WH6635> O God<WH430>?
Oh give<WH3051> us help<WH5833> against<WH4480> the adversary,<WH6862> For deliverance<WH8668> by man<WH120> is in vain.<WH7723>
Through God<WH430> we shall do<WH6213> valiantly;<WH2428> And it is He who will tread<WH947> down<WH947> our adversaries.<WH6862>
